void PathMgr::removeCycles ( )

Remove cycles of the netlist by temporarly reversing the directions of pins. Take O(n) time where n is the number of nodes

Remove cycles of netlist by temporarly reversing the directions of pins. See "Graph Drawing" Section 9.4 for detail
